Sentencas: NiO/YSZ composite particles with 20-35 mol% Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 (YSZ) were synthesized by the spray pyrolysis (SP) method.
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO/YSZ composite particles

Sentencas: The NiO/YSZ composite particles showed morphology of NiO grains partially or fully covered with fine YSZ grains.
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO/YSZ composite particles

Sentencas: The composite particles also had good interface connection between nickel oxide and yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ).
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO/YSZ composite particles

Sentencas: The morphology of the Ni/YSZ cermet anode fabricated from composite particles is noticeably influenced by the YSZ content of the composite particles.
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO/YSZ composite particles

Sentencas: Ni/YSZ cermet anodes with 25 mol% YSZ show the highest electrochemical activity and lowest internal resistance (IR).
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO/YSZ composite particles

Sentencas: The electrochemical activity and IR of the anode in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) highly depend on the three-phase boundary structure based on the metal (Ni) and ceramic (YSZ) interface as well as the network structure of each Ni grains.
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO/YSZ composite particles

Sentencas: Moreover, the cell voltage of a single cell with the Ni/YSZ cermet anode kept almost constant value during 7200 It of operation.
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO/YSZ composite particles

Sentencas: Consequently, it is concluded that the performance and stability of the Ni/YSZ cermet anode is improved by controlling the morphology of the NiO/YSZ composite particles.
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO/YSZ composite particles
